Package src.Controller.Camp.Staff

Class StaffCampController

java.lang.Object
src.Controller.Camp.CampController
src.Controller.Camp.Staff.StaffCampController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IStaffCampController
public class StaffCampController extends CampController implements IStaffCampController
A controller class for managing camp-related operations by staff. This class extends CampController and implements IStaffCampController.

  • Method Details

    • createCamp

      public void createCamp(Staff staff, String campName, String starting_date, String ending_date, String registrationClosingDate, String userGroup, String location, int totalSlots, int committeeSlots, String description, String staffInCharge, boolean visibility)
      Creates a new camp with specified details. Ensures that the staff can only create camps for their own faculty, checks for date validity, and avoids duplicate camp names.
      Specified by:
      createCamp in interface IStaffCampController
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff member creating the camp.
      campName - The name of the camp.
      starting_date - The starting date of the camp.
      ending_date - The ending date of the camp.
      registrationClosingDate - The closing date for camp registration.
      userGroup - The target user group for the camp.
      location - The location of the camp.
      totalSlots - The total number of slots available in the camp.
      committeeSlots - The number of slots available for committee members.
      description - A brief description of the camp.
      staffInCharge - The staff member in charge of the camp.
      visibility - The visibility status of the camp (true for visible, false for hidden).

    • checkCamp

      public int checkCamp(Staff staff, String campName)
      Checks whether a given camp can be edited by a staff member based on faculty association.
      Specified by:
      checkCamp in interface IStaffCampController
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff member attempting to check the camp.
      campName - The name of the camp to be checked.
      Returns:
      An integer indicating the result of the check (0 for error, 1 for no error).

    • editCamp

      public void editCamp(Staff staff, String campName, int change_idx, String string_change, int int_change)
      Edits an existing camp based on the given changes. Only allows editing of camps owned by the staff member.
      Specified by:
      editCamp in interface IStaffCampController
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff member editing the camp.
      campName - The name of the camp to be edited.
      change_idx - The index indicating the attribute to be changed.
      string_change - The new string value for the attribute (if applicable).
      int_change - The new integer value for the attribute (if applicable).

    • deleteCamp

      public void deleteCamp(Staff staff, String campName)
      Deletes a camp based on the given name. Only allows deletion of camps owned by the staff member.
      Specified by:
      deleteCamp in interface IStaffCampController
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff member who wants to delete the camp.
      campName - The name of the camp to be deleted.

    • toggleVisibility

      public void toggleVisibility(Staff staff, String campName, boolean visibility)
      Toggles the visibility of a camp. Checks if the camp belongs to the staff's faculty before toggling.
      Specified by:
      toggleVisibility in interface IStaffCampController
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff member toggling the visibility.
      campName - The name of the camp for which visibility is being toggled.
      visibility - The desired visibility status (true for visible, false for hidden).

    • viewAllCamps

      public void viewAllCamps(String filter, String option)
      Views all camps with the option to filter by location, camp name, or date.
      Specified by:
      viewAllCamps in interface IStaffCampController
      Parameters:
      filter - The filter criterion (e.g., "Location", "Camp Name", "Date").
      option - The specific value for the chosen filter criterion.

    • viewOwnCamps

      public List<Camp> viewOwnCamps(Staff s)
      Returns a list of camps that are associated with the given staff member.
      Specified by:
      viewOwnCamps in interface IStaffCampController
      Parameters:
      s - The staff member whose camps are to be viewed.
      Returns:
      A list of Camp objects representing the staff member's own camps.
